name: Lyndor
description:
-- Currently in Alpha stage -- Not all features are implemented.

The game has been in development for 7 weeks.

Dive into the world where piggies are loved by all. The villagers are speaking of a special event happening tomorrow... What could that be?

Your task is to find out what is happening in this world. happy exploring!

-- Credits --

Producer & UI, Peetsj (https://twitter.com/peetsjdev)

Lead 3D Artist, Rivvion

Lead UX & Story, Sascha Grief (https://twitter.com/SaschaGrief)

Lead Development & Sound, happy30 (https://twitter.com/happythirsty)
